mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_FILE ( SEQ, F_SEQ, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE ) VALUES ( #{seq}, ( SELECT IFNULL(MAX(F_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM BOARD_FILE A WHERE SEQ = #{seq} ), #{originalFileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET CNT = CNT + 1 WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
